title: Matplotlib Ticked Patheffect
description: In this lab, we will learn how to add ticks along a line in Matplotlib using Ticked Patheffect. Ticks can be added to mark one side as a barrier and you can control the angle, spacing, and length of the ticks. Ticks will also appear appropriately in the legend.

meta.title: Matplotlib Ticked Patheffect Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to add ticks along a line in Matplotlib using Ticked Patheffect, including controlling the angle, spacing, and length of the ticks.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, ticked patheffect, line plot, data visualization
